findings.title: Admin can manually swap
findings.description: The admin has the privilege to manually swap tokens or assets without any restrictions.

findings.title: Admin Can Manually Send Tokens to Charity Wallet
findings.description: The admin has the privilege to manually send tokens to the charity wallet, which can be changed to any account address.

findings.title: Admin can change the charity wallet address
findings.description: The admin has the privilege to modify the charity wallet address, which could lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Admin can change the launch start time and launch volume duration
findings.description: The admin has privileges to modify the launch start time and launch volume duration, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeAccount() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply, respectively, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
